title: How to Reach Bannerghatta National Park from Bangalore

steps.title: Reach the Kempegowda BMTC bus stand by 9AM morning.
steps.content: Reach the Kempegowda BMTC bus stand by 9AM morning.

steps.title: Board bus no.365 or 365J from platform number 17, which directly goes to the Bannerghatta national park.
steps.content: Board bus no.365 or 365J from platform number 17, which directly goes to the Bannerghatta national park.

steps.title: If you stay somewhere near Whitefield area in Bangalore, take a bus no.335 from Hope farm to Marathahalli bridge, bus no.500C from there to Jayadeva hospital junction and bus no.365 from there to the park.
steps.content: If you stay somewhere near Whitefield area in Bangalore, take a bus no.335 from Hope farm to Marathahalli bridge, bus no.500C from there to Jayadeva hospital junction and bus no.365 from there to the park.

steps.title: Walk to the main ticket counter, pay Rs.260/ person if you want to go for the grand Safari that includes Bear safari, Tiger safari, Lion safari, Herbivorous safari and the zoo.
steps.content: Walk to the main ticket counter, pay Rs.260/ person if you want to go for the grand Safari that includes Bear safari, Tiger safari, Lion safari, Herbivorous safari and the zoo.

steps.title: Pay Rs.25 for camera and Rs.
steps.content: Pay Rs.25 for camera and Rs. 120 for video camera.

steps.title: Pay Rs.80/person if you want to see only the zoo and not the Safari.
steps.content: Pay Rs.80/person if you want to see only the zoo and not the Safari.

steps.title: If you want to visit the Butterfly Park, walk up to the entry of the butterfly park and pay Rs.25/person and Rs.25 for camera (If not paid at the main gate)
steps.content: If you want to visit the Butterfly Park, walk up to the entry of the butterfly park and pay Rs.25/person and Rs.25 for camera (If not paid at the main gate)

steps.title: Discount available for children between 5 years to 12 years (Rs.130), below 5 years (free), senior citizens over 60 years (Rs.
steps.content: Discount available for children between 5 years to 12 years (Rs.130), below 5 years (free), senior citizens over 60 years (Rs. 160, ID proof is must) and physically disabled, also foreign citizens can pay in US $
